resources.string: Elara gracefully enters, her silvery robes trailing behind her like whispers of magic, a faint luminescence outlining her as if the very air around her held secrets of ancient spells.\n\n"A glass of the finest elven mead, please. Something that shimmers like moonlight on a river, if you have it. It\'s been a day filled with casting enchantments; a soothing drink is much needed."

string-array.name: player_elara
string-array.item: Sounds like your day was a whirlwind of enchantments! I hope a moment of respite with your drink can weave a sense of calm.
Dodging trouble and seeking an elusive drink, huh? Careful, or that elixir might just disappear like your sneaky adversaries.
Ah, enchantress of the day, weaving magic and seeking solace in a drink that shimmers like moonlight. I\'d offer my company, but I fear I\'d pale in comparison to your mystical aura.

string-array.name: elara_resp
string-array.item: Thank you. A bit of tranquility after a day of enchanting chaos would be most welcome.
Perhaps, but I doubt even a sneaky drink could escape me tonight.
Your company might just add to the enchantment of the evening, wouldn\'t it?
